## Diverging Graph Example


![](diverging.png)


```r 
data3 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= reorder(issue, (rank)), y = value, fill = barrier)) +
  geom_col() + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("darkorange3", "darkorange", "darkolivegreen", "darkolivegreen3")) +
  coord_flip()
```
